# Sign-up

Please sign up using the following form:

The minimal fee per participant is

```{r}
menu_2 <- 13
menu_1 <- 10
packed_lunch <- 6.5
unpacked_lunch <- 7.5
coffee_break <- 3
participants <- 6:20
instructors <- 4
people <- instructors + participants
delivery <- 5
cost1 <- 9*delivery + 6*coffee_break*people +  3*menu_2*people
cost2 <- 9*delivery + 6*coffee_break*people +  3*unpacked_lunch*people
cost3 <- 9*delivery + 6*coffee_break*people +  3*packed_lunch*people
cost4 <- 9*delivery + 6*coffee_break*people +  3*menu_1*people

plot(participants,cost1/participants, type = "o", ylim = c(45,105))
points(participants,cost2/participants, type = "o", col = "dodgerblue")
points(participants,cost3/participants, type = "o", col = "blue")
points(participants,cost4/participants, type = "o", col = "grey60")
legend("topright", legend = c("Menu 2", "Menu 1", "Unpacked", "Packed"), fill = c("black", "grey60", "blue", "dodgerblue"))
abline(h=c(60,70))
```
